item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Always do what you are afraid to do." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "When it is dark enough, you can see the stars." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Nothing great was ever achieved without enthusiasm." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Don't be too timid and squeamish about your actions. All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make the better." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Every artist was first an amateur." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The purpose of life is not to be happy. It is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate, to have it make some difference that you have lived and lived well." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Cultivate the habit of being grateful for every good thing that comes to you, and to give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement, you should include all things in your gratitude." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Susan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I'm a success today because I had a friend who believed in me and I didn't have the heart to let him down." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Susan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Susan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "I am in favor of animal rights as well as human rights. That is the way of a whole human being." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Susan add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Every man's happiness is his own responsibility." -- Abraham Lincoln
